descriptionlist.description: In order to use, just enable the Animated White Lines Respring Icon in Anemone and respring for the changes to take effect.

Please Note: In order for this respring logo to work properly, the tweak "MakeRespringsGreatAgain" cannot be installed. Having it installed will cause the Animated White Lines Respring Icon to not display properly. If you have "MakeRespringsGreatAgain," please uninstall it before installing the Animated White Lines Respring Icon.

screenshot.description: This will be the displayed respring animation
